activities:
DSA is a dedicated pharmacovigilance services provider operating predominantly in the United States and Europe. We supplement or manage any component of a clients pharmacovigilance program through a full suite of clinical and post-market services. Our comprehensive range of safety experience covers the pharmaceutical, biotech, consumer health/over-the-counter, medical device and animal health categories.

Data is shared between DSA' US offices and those of our clients located within European and includes:
Personal Details
Goods or Services Provided
Details of service users usual and previous medical advisors
Medical History
Medical Procedures
Details of other drugs and treatments

All data is used to support the on going development and management of the requested client service offering.
contacttitle1: Chief Compliance and Risk Management Officer
corpofftitle1: Chief Compliance and Risk Management Officer
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client, customer, patient, inhouse and online, manually processed
recoursemech: DSA has committed to refer unresolved privacy complaints under the ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program, operated by the American Arbitration Association.
